resources.string: PokerBotApp
Welcome to the Deadpan App!

With Calculator Mode, you play normally, entering your hand and the flop as they appear, and the calculator will give you your possible hands, your chances of getting them, and what cards are needed to make them.

With Decision Mode, everything\'s taken care of for you. Just enter your starting chip amount, hand, and the flop as it comes up, and the recommended bets, bluffs, or folds will be given. Also allows manual entry of bets if you choose to deviate from the recommendations.
This app was created by Bradley Ames and is both a calculator and "bot" for standard Texas Hold\'em.\nPlease use responsibly.
Please Enter Your\nStarting Hand:
*If playing with chips with no monetary value, enter the # of chips
